#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <set>

#define all(V) (V).begin(), (V).end()
#define sz(V) (V).size()
#define loop(i,j,n) for( int (i)=(j); (i) < (j); (i)++ )

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T, m, n, i;

	cin >> T;

	int size = 31650;
	int A[size];
	A[0] = A[1] = false;
	for ( i = 2; i < size; i++ )
		A[i] = true;

	vector< int > primes;
	for ( i = 0; i < size; i++ ) {
		if ( A[i] ) {
			primes.push_back( i );
			int k = 2;
			for ( int j = k*i; j < size; k++, j = k*i )
				A[j] = false;
		}
	}

	m = 0;
	n = 100000;
	int Ar[ 100000 ];
	int k = 0;
	set< int > s;
	int range = n-m+1;

	bool B[range];
	for ( i = 0; i < range; i++ )
		B[i] = true;
	for ( int j = 0; j < primes.size(); j++ ) {
		int p = primes[j];
		if ( p <= n && p >= m ) {
			Ar[k++] = p;
		}
		for ( i = ceil( m/p ); (i*p)-m < range; i++ ) {
			if ( (i*p)-m >= 0 )
				B[ (i*p)-m ] = false;
		}
	}

	for ( i = 0; i < range; i++ )
		if ( B[i] && i+m != 1 ) {
			Ar[k++] = i+m;
		}

	int fin[ 5000 ];
	int l = 0;
	for ( i = 1; i < k; i++ ) {
		if ( 2*Ar[i] == Ar[i-1] + Ar[i+1] )
			fin[l++] = Ar[i];
	}
	int test;
	while ( T-- ) {
		cin >> test;
		cout << fin[ test-1 ] << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
